title: Create a Spring Boot project
content: Create a Spring Boot project Content Introduction to Spring Boot How to create

title: Introduction
content: Introduction to Spring Boot Spring Boot is a powerful framework designed to simplify the development of Java applications, particularly those built using the Spring framework. By streamlining the configuration and deployment process, Spring Boot allows developers to focus on building robust, scalable, and production-ready applications with minimal boilerplate code and configuration

title: Web
content:
Create on web Access Spring initializr
Access link to create project Set up as below Add dependencies Download
Select Generate Unzip the file after downloaded Open Intellij
Open the file that unziped

title: Create
content:
Create project In this step, we will create a Spring Boot project
Content Create on web Create on Intellij

title: Intellij
content:
Create on Intellij Select New Project Set up
Select generator: Spring initializr Name the project Select type: Maven Choose Next Add dependencies
Add suitable dependencies Choose Create
